remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>

O tipo para o qual converter.
Docs.summary: Determina se o pode converter um para o tipo especificado.
Docs.returns: Se o pode converter um para o tipo especificado; caso contrário, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> método `true` se `destinationType` é <xref:System.String> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>. Caso contrário, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> retorna `false`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> pode converter os seguintes tipos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>
Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> para evitar lançar uma exceção.
